title: Saucer, mid-18th century
markings: underglaze blue: double crossed swords; incised underglaze marks: "4" on cup; "4" on saucer
dimensions:
a)H: 4.7 x W: 8.2 x L: 9.8 cm
b) H: 3 x D: 13.6 cm
description: Cup with simple loop handle; saucer deep, with curved sides.  Inside of cup and saucer white, with scattered flowers; outside of cup and underside of rim of saucer yellw, with white reserve panels, on cup, in which are flowers.  Edges of cup and saucer brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Saucer, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. porcelain. Gift of Mrs. Edward Luckemeyer. 1912-13-14-a,b.
